item.title: MPW
item.description: score:1 Chances: Are things finally looking up for this beaten-down REIT? The hospital-focused REIT finally had some good news. Medical Properties Trust is making progress on its plan to get back on solid ground. Risks: Buying this stock will probably result in losing your money.
